mapper.insert: INSERT into t_b_inspect(prescriptionid,applyid,patientid,orgcode,dept, aim,part,category,summary,diagnosis,fee, createat,createby,modifyat,modifyby) VALUES ((select id from t_b_prescription where prescriptionno = #{prescriptionNo}), #{inspect.applyId},#{inspect.patientId},#{inspect.orgCode},#{inspect.dept}, #{inspect.aim},#{inspect.part},#{inspect.category},#{inspect.summary},#{inspect.diagnosis},#{inspect.fee}, #{inspect.createAt},#{inspect.createBy},#{inspect.modifyAt},#{inspect.modifyBy})
